price: 196. Let not the free disposal (and affluence) of the disbelievers throughout the land deceive you.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
